main.name: Rishik Sahu
main.description: This is my modern portfolio website where you can see my work and learn more about me
main.bio: I'm interested in Web Development & Android Development. I have worked with a few comapnies as a freelancer and gained a good level of exposure. I'm good at understanding business perspective of the project and optimise the technology to meet the business requirements and enhance customer experience.
main.contactmessage: Liked my profile? I'm always open to discuss new opportunities. Feel free to contact me.

resume.skillmessage: I have worked with a lot of technologies and tools, some are listed here.

work.title: Web Developer (Freelance)
work.description: Built responsive landing pages for products and services | Built end-to-end websites using WordPress & ReactJS | Managed LMS platforms and web hosting panels.

work.title: Android Developer (Freelance)
work.description: Built Jharkhand Warrior android app (E-Learning App) | In this app, users can purchase courses, test series & notes | Technology used: Java, XML & Firebase.

projects.title: Stock Alerts

testimonials.text: Rishik is a determined person and very good at finding solutions. He has helped our organization to sail through various difficult technical challenges while launching our own platform for selling courses and course delivery. It was an amazing experience working with him.
The only thing I would like to say about him is he is a super honest, dedicated and resourceful person. I am very satisfied with his work.
